ygData.subject: Re: Post Patch Procing
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm.. you all sure about this?  I was fighting HGs with a group in Rathe Mountains last night and proc ed many times with my SoW and Obsidian Shard.  And I was
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm.. you all sure about this? I was fighting HGs with a group in Rathe Mountains last night and proc'ed
many times with my SoW and Obsidian Shard. And I was definitely singing.

Gaspode Talechaser wrote:

> From: Gaspode Talechaser <seali@...>
>
> Try this:
>
> Put all your normal equipment on, don't play any songs at all. You
> will proc as normal. Start singing something and you will not proc
> so long as you have the song going. This was a problem before, and
> was fixed, but it is broken again.
>
> Way to go verant.
>
> Gaspode
>
> JasonF <JasonF@...> said:
>
> > The last hour or so I loaded up all of my DEX equipment and played
> Chant of
> > Battle and had a DEX of 186 and didn't proc once. After killing
> Bouncers I
> > ran over to Cazic-Thule and beat on some lizzies and gators for
> testing
> > purposes (also 186 DEX) and got not a single proc while there
> (around 20
> > solo kills).
> >
> > Crier Sharpsong
> >

--
Steven S. Klug
sklug@...
